price: Hakika mimi ninakukhofieni adhabu ya Siku Kubwa.
arabic: إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ
footnotes: Mimi nina khofu asije Mwenyezi Mungu akakuteremshieni adhabu kali hapa duniani, na Akhera akakutieni katika Moto wa Jahannamu kwa sababu ya ujabari wenu na starehe alizo kustarehesheni Mwenyezi Mungu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: innī akhāfu ʿalaykum ʿadhāba yawmin ʿaẓīmin
